remarks: The symmetric group on a singleton is the symmetric group S_1 consisting of the identity only.  (Contributed by AV, 9-Dec-2018.)
statement:
symg1bas.1 $e |- G = ( SymGrp ` A ) $.
symg1bas.2 $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
symg1bas.0 $e |- A = { I } $.
symg1bas $p |- ( I e. V -> B = { { <. I , I >. } } ) $.
